instructions:
1. Pulse shrimp in food processor, about 7 pulses, so there are some coarse pieces left.
  2. Whisk mayo, scallions, parsley, lemon zest, salt, pepper and cayenne together.
  3. Fold in shrimp and breadcrumbs. Divide into 4 patties and refrigerate 30 minutes.
  4. Heat oil to medium high, and cook patties for 8-10 minutes until browned.
  5. Serve with lemon wedges.
